name: Can I Has Fame Plz?
description:
Click, click! OMG have you seen this new FameTuber? 
YES, this is a clicker game! - Help rookie streamer Oinari Mimyu on her journey to fame and fortune. All you have to do is give her tons of likes ("Fame Points") - share her stream and even manage her outfits!
This is not Twitch nor Onlyfans - and yet, you can have the ultimate simp experience in this game. ( A simp simulator if you will, or short: simpulator ) You always wanted to support a streamer who doesn't know your name, without actually paying money...? This is the game for you. It's pretty safe for work, no full nudity or anything so... Like, rate and subscribe! Never stop clicking! Share Mimyu's stream, share Mimyu's dream! #other #clicker #clickergame #fame
